data.comment: 6508 spectators have come along to RZD Arena today.
The match is underway. Tambov have kicked-off.
Evgeni Turbin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Evgeni Turbin signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
Tambov have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Stanislav Magkeev misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Tambov at RZD Arena.
In the minute 6, Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fedor Smolov puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 7, Great play from Anton Miranchuk to set up the goal.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
In the minute 10, Free kick Tambov.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Evgeni Turbin waits before resuming play because Valeriu Ciuperca for Tambov is still down.
Valeriu Ciuperca has recovered and rejoins the match in Moscow.
Throw-in Tambov.
In the minute 15, Lokomotiv Moscow are coming forward and Anton Miranchuk gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 18, Can Tambov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Tambov.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 25, Important block from the Lokomotiv Moscow defence as Vladimir Obukhov fires in a strike for Tambov.
Tambov drive upfield and Valeriu Ciuperca gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lokomotiv Moscow defender.
Fedor Smolov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 27, Evgeni Turbin signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Tambov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Tambov.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 33, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Vladimir Obukhov (Tambov) strikes at RZD Arena but his header is cleared.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Tambov.
Evgeni Turbin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Tambov.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick Tambov.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Evgeni Turbin awards Tambov a goal kick.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 41, Evgeni Shlyakov for Tambov has been booked by Evgeni Turbin and receives a first yellow card.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In the minute 42, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tambov make their first substitution with Soslan Takazov replacing Adessoye Oyewole.
In the minute 44, Eder for Lokomotiv Moscow drives towards goal at RZD Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 45, Evgeni Turbin will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Tambov's Vladimir Obukhov has run offside.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Lokomotiv Moscow have kicked-off the second half at RZD Arena.
Throw-in Tambov.
Mikhail Kostyukov is on a sub for Pavel Karasev for Tambov.
In the minute 47, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Tambov needs to be cautious. Lokomotiv Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.

Free kick for Tambov in their own half.

In Moscow, Evgeni Shlyakov of Tambov is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tambov have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
In the minute 60, Evgeni Turbin blows against Tambov's Kirill Panchenko for offside.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.

At RZD Arena, Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov has been yellow-carded for the home team.

Tambov drive forward but Oleksandr Kaplienko is judged offside.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
In the minute 64, The home team replace Francois Kamano with Rifat Zhemaletdinov.
Murilo Cerqueira (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Tambov's Sergey Ryzhikov has been booked in Moscow.
In the minute 67, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Stanislav Magkeev is booked for the home team.
Evgeni Turbin signals a throw-in for Tambov, close to Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
In Moscow Lokomotiv Moscow drive forward through Fedor Smolov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 69, Lokomotiv Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Rifat Zhemaletdinov of Lokomotiv Moscow is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Evgeni Turbin awards the home team a throw-in.
Vitali Lisakovich is replacing Eder for the home team.
In the minute 73, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk is on target but unsuccessful.

In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Tambov in Moscow.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Tambov make their third substitution with Aleksandre Karapetian replacing Kirill Panchenko.
In the minute 76, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow needs to be cautious. Tambov have an attacking throw-in.
Evgeni Shlyakov for Tambov is whistled offside.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Lokomotiv Moscow in Moscow.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 83, Evgeni Turbin signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Tambov's half.
Lokomotiv Moscow are whistled for offside.
In the minute 86, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Rifat Zhemaletdinov (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Evgeni Turbin awards the home team a throw-in.
Vedran Corluka is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 88, Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Vedran Corluka returns to the field for Lokomotiv Moscow after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in Tambov.
At RZD Arena the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Tambov in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Throw-in for Tambov at RZD Arena.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Daniil Kulikov is replacing Anton Miranchuk for the home team.
Dmitry Rybchinskiy is on a sub for Fedor Smolov for Lokomotiv Moscow.
